name: py-weblogo

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
WebLogo is a web based application designed to make the generation of
sequence logos as easy and painless as possible.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: ghostscript
dependencies.description: An interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.

dependencies.name: pdf2svg
dependencies.description: A simple PDF to SVG converter using the Poppler and Cairo libraries.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-phydms
dependent_to.description:
phydms enables phylogenetic analyses using deep mutational scanning data
to inform the substitution models. It implements Experimentally informed
codon models (ExpCM) for phylogenetic inference and the detection of
biologically interesting selection.
